title: Aller-911® Dog Allergy Aid - NaturVet®
author: Linda Morgan
description: Aller-911® Dog Allergy Aid helps support the immune system and maintains respiratory health. Save 10% on every order with a subscription. Shop now »
cleaned_text: Allergy Aid Soft Chews [Find a store](/pages/where-to-buy) For use in dogs over the age of 12 weeks. Provides a source of antioxidants to support a normal immune system. Omegas, DHA, and EPA to help maintain proper skin moisture and respiratory health. Product Info Product Info For use in dogs over the age of 12 weeks. Provides a source of antioxidants to support a normal immune system. Omegas, DHA, and EPA to help maintain proper skin moisture and respiratory health. Active Ingredients Active Ingredients Active Ingredients per 2 Soft Chews: Omega-3 Fatty Acids (Fish Oil) 53 mg Turmeric Root 50 mg Grape Seed Extract 25 mg Quercetin 25 mg Pumpkin Powder 25 mg Bromelain 25 mg EPA (Eicosapentaenoic Acid) 21 mg DHA (Docosahexaenoic Acid) 14 mg Inactive Ingredients Inactive Ingredients Brewers Dried Yeast, Canola Oil, Flaxseed, Glycerin, Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Rosemary Extract, Sorbic Acid, Tapioca Starch, Vegetable Oil, Water. Directions For Use Directions For Use Directions For Use: (Daily) |Weight||Amount| |Up to 20 chews| |61 lbs. and over ||6 soft chews| Amount can be divided between AM and PM. Cautions Cautions If animal's condition worsens or does not improve, stop product administration and consult your veterinarian. Safe use in pregnant animals or animals intended for breeding has not been proven. May be GI irritant. Do not use in high doses with anticoagulant drugs or patients with stomach ulcers. Not to be used with blood thinners or anticoagulants. Warnings: Not for human consumption. Keep out of the reach of children and animals. In case of accidental overdose, contact a health professional immediately. Due to the tasty nature of our products, do not leave package unattended around pets. Aller-911® Allergy Aid Soft Chews - Provides a source of antioxidants to support a normal immune system - Rich in Omegas, DHA and EPA to help maintain proper skin moisture and respiratory health Have an order or product issue? We'd love to help! Please send an email to [naturvet@naturvet.com](mailto:naturvet@naturvet.com) and we will get back to you as soon as possible. Customer Reviews [Write a review](#) A natural allergy relief remedy that works without nasty chemicals! A win-win for sure for you and your pet! My 8-year-old staffy has always struggled with summertime itchiness - his skin can't handle the heat! These have really made a difference this year and calmed down his irritated skin. He will even eat them as a treat! Aller-911® Allergy Aid Soft Chews After one canister a lot of Zeke's itching seems to be in abeyance. Fall seems to be his worst time of the year, as well as an allergy to grain. Putting him on a different diet has helped. For right now his ears are clean and I haven't had to use any medication for his feet and chin in 2 months. He really seems to like them as he trots over to get them at breakfast/dinner time so that's a plus too..
